mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cat_id AS "catId", a.name AS "name", a.discription AS "discription", a.create_id AS "createId.id", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_cate_property_info( id, cat_id, name, discription, create_id, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{catId}, #{name}, #{discription}, #{createId.id}, #{createTime} )
